tool_description: Generates concise previews and summaries of journal entries for quick review and selection.

entry_ids.description: List of entry IDs to generate previews for

include_keywords.description: Whether to highlight key themes in the preview

show_sentiment.description: Whether to include sentiment analysis in preview

error_messages: Invalid entry IDs: Some entry IDs do not exist or cannot be accessed
Too many entries: Maximum 30 entries can be previewed at once
Preview generation failed: Some entries may be too short or corrupted
usage: Provide entry_ids and configure preview options to get quick summaries before full retrieval.

previews.description: Generated preview text for each entry

entry_titles.description: Generated or extracted titles for each entry

key_themes.description: Main themes identified in each entry
